member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount
member.summary: Represents a dSTS service account.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.Id
member.summary: Service account GUID.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.ServiceTreeId
member.summary: Service Tree GUID of the service who owns the service acccount.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.GroupId
member.summary:
Optional. GUID of the dSCM service account group to which the service account belongs.
If null or empty, the service account will be created under the service's default group.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.CloudId
member.summary: An identifier representing the cloud where the service account resides.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.DstsInstance
member.summary: The dSTS instance where the service account resides.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.AccountName
member.summary: The name of the service account.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.Realms
member.summary:
The realms of the service account.
At least one realm is required.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.ClaimMappings
member.summary: Optional. The claim mappings which apply to this service account.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceAccount.AuthenticationRequirements
member.summary: Optional. The authentication requirements for the service account.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata
member.summary: Represents metadata for an onboarded service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata.Id
member.summary: Service Tree ID.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata.Name
member.summary: Friendly name of the service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata.Owners
member.summary:
User principals who are the owners of this service.
Currently, service owners have the same permissions as service approvers.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata.Approvers
member.summary:
Principals who can approve configuration requests for this service.
This list can contain user principals and group principals.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata.NotificationRecipients
member.summary: Email addresses for which notifications are sent for this service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata.DevOwners
member.summary: Dev Owners of the service as provided in service tree.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata.PmOwners
member.summary: Pm Owners of the service as provided in service tree.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Security.ConfigurationManagement.Contracts.ServiceMetadata.AdminAliases
member.summary: Admin Alias of the service as provided in service tree.
